short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for hotels worldwide and enjoy up to 50% off with our great deals and late offers - directly from our extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With up to 50% off all kinds of properties worldwide, you’re sure to find a stay for your every need.

This Chrome App gives you speedy access to LateRooms.com’s thousands of great hotel deals, helping you enjoy huge savings on a whole range of wonderful stays – from cosy B&Bs to Country Castles, Moroccan Riads to Luxury Spas. 

What’s more, we now have over 1.4 million genuine guest reviews to help you choose, left only by people who have booked and stayed through LateRooms.com. 

Here are a few more reasons why you should book with us:

• Book now, pay when you stay¹
• No booking or cancellation fees²
• Book online or by telephone 24/7
• Instant email confirmation
• Up to 50% off all kinds of stays 
• 1.4m+ genuine hotel reviews from our bookers

¹Some hotels may offer advanced purchase. ²If you cancel within the hotel’s cancellation period.

LateRooms.com. For your every need
